name: Hatchcraft
description:
A local multiplayer hatch em up, steal em up and fight em up.

Features 4 different and unique animals to ride each with a special ability

  • Wolf: life steal and slow
  • Chicken: lay up to 3 egg mines
  • Rat: invincible during speed dash
  • Spider: climb walls

NOTE: only XBOX controller works best, ps4/other w xinput can work but buttons are jumbled.

Awared First Place of UTS Games Showcase.

Hatchcraft project was created by these lovely people:

Anthony Nguyen, Caleb O'Reilly, Sam Alexandropolous, Veronica Sue
